answers.answer: yuck good luck i got so sick with both test but passed the 3 hours.
Good luck!!  I hate that test.  I took mine a few weeks ago and thankfully passed my 1 hour test.
Did my 3 hour test this am...  yuck!  Glad it's done although I am not looking forward to the GD diet.  I hated it last time.
I am in shock: I actually passed my 3 hour test!!!  Hee-haa!!!!!
I'm taking my 3 hr one next week I'm so nervous!
Good luck and bring some snack with you to eat after the test!  You will be really weak w/o food and after 4 blood draws.

question: I just failed my 1 hour test  :(I had GD last pregnancy so this was expected, especially since with twins I am at higher risk of GD to begin with.Going for my 3 hours test tomorrow.  Yuck!!!
title: Gestational Diabetes: Have you taken the test?
